name: Mathematics I
description: An introductory course to Mathematics covering basic algebra and calculus.

name: Physics II
description: A continuation of Physics I, focusing on electromagnetism and thermodynamics.

name: Chemistry I
description: An introductory course to Chemistry covering atomic structure and chemical reactions.

name: Biology
description: A comprehensive course on Biology, including cell biology and genetics.

name: English
description: A course on English language and literature, focusing on grammar and composition.

name: History
description: A course on world history, covering ancient to modern times.

name: Geography
description: A course on physical and human geography, including map reading and spatial analysis.

name: Computer Science
description: An introductory course to computer science, covering programming and algorithms.

name: Art
description: A course on visual arts, including drawing, painting, and sculpture.

name: Music
description: A course on music theory and practice, including instrument playing and composition.
